title: How to Make a Berry Smoothie

steps.headline: Pour 1 cup of orange juice into the blender.
steps.description: Add 1/2 cup of  yogurt into the juice

steps.headline: Toss in about 1/2 cup of the frozen berries.
steps.description: Save a few to top the smoothie. Try frozen berries, as it creates a thicker blend, and makes it really cold and delicious. You will almost need a spoon to eat it.

steps.headline: Blend until the mixture is thick and creamy.
Pour your smoothie into glasses and add whipped cream or a few berries and  a straw.

text: Pour 1 cup of orange juice into the blender. Add 1/2 cup of  yogurt into the juice Toss in about 1/2 cup of the frozen berries. Save a few to top the smoothie. Try frozen berries, as it creates a thicker blend, and makes it really cold and delicious. You will almost need a spoon to eat it. Blend until the mixture is thick and creamy.  Pour your smoothie into glasses and add whipped cream or a few berries and  a straw.  Finished.
